src: ARI : Hello . I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RP : I have an appointment . src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Ask how ... # incomplete-da ( ) RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? # greet ( ) ; request ( food ) @ G ( RC , eat ( ) ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . # inform ( food ) @ AG ( RC , eat ( ) ) RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) [start] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? # r-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . # p-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) [MASK] RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? src: [start] ARI : Hello , I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Well , um , we 'd like to go to room 17 for an appointment . Where is ... src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . The reception is just behind me .
